mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS "id", p.va_id AS "vaId", p.amount AS "amount", p.status AS "status", p.created_at AS "createdAt", u.username AS "username", r.reservant_name AS "reservantName", r.id AS "reservationId" FROM payments p INNER JOIN virtual_accounts va ON p.va_id = va.id INNER JOIN reservations r ON va.res_id = r.id LEFT JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.id ORDER BY p.id DESC
